titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Phi Beta Kappa, Yale University, Records
Phi Beta Kappa, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:27

did.unittitle: Phi Beta Kappa, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, manuscripts, scrapbooks, printed material, catalogues, dissertations, minutes, register books, membership lists, speeches, the original 1789 charter, and financial material documenting elections, presentations and addresses, honorary appointments and medalists, and other activities of the Connecticut Alpha chapter of Phi Beta Kappa at Yale.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Phi Beta Kappa. Connecticut Alpha (Yale University)

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 40 (YRG 40), Records of Yale clubs, societies, and organizations.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Phi Beta Kappa, Yale University, Records (RU 58). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, manuscripts, scrapbooks, printed material, catalogues, dissertations, minutes, register books, membership lists, speeches, the original 1789 charter, and financial material documenting elections, presentations and addresses, honorary appointments and medalists, and other activities of the Connecticut Alpha chapter of Phi Beta Kappa at Yale.

controlaccess.subject: College students -- Societies, etc.
Greek letter societies
Secret societies -- United States
controlaccess.corpname: Phi Beta Kappa. Connecticut Alpha (Yale University)

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Committee: Isaac M. Clay, Leonard E. Wales, Henry T. Strong Henry H. Bacot, John M. Austin, Eli Ives, M.D.; Signers: Samuel F. Jarvis, Nathan Johnson, William -----, Noyes Darling, Tutor, Hezekiah G. Ufford, Henry W. Channing, Jacob Sutherland, Curtiss Warner, John Dunwoody, Charles Chauncey, Jr., William M. Gibson, Justus McKinstrey, William M. Smith, Jonathan Knight, A.B. Northrop, Simeon Baldwin, James Gilbert, M.D., Robert Smith, Silas Robbins, Godrich Mallery.
